category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_ui_title_format
preference.preference_description: Defines the title pattern on UI panels. - {0} = user - {1} = group - {2} = role - {3} = name of the current CATIA environment - {4} = current project name - {5} = full group path - {6} = Site name
